content:
I've reviewed the IGs for publication. There's plenty of errors but there's a mix of minor tooling issues, editorial issues, and vocabulary issues.

None of them are enough to justify not publishing the IGs for ballot
though I may get a few more resolved before ballot

Anyone got the link to the IG build status summary page?
The one that takes http://build.fhir.org/ig/builds.json and shows a table of all the guides, there status, and a button to force a rebuild.
Thanks, exactly what I was looking for.
